caption.p: Antioxidant analysis and total polyphenol determination. a Significant difference when compared to the CR-Aq; b significant difference when compared to CR-Meth; c significant difference when compared to CR-DCM at p < 0.05. Graph ( a): total polyphenols (TP); graph ( b): oxygen radical absorbance capacity (ORAC); graph ( c): DPPH: 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl assay.
